title: COURSOHELIC
description: An Web App for simplifying the complex mapping algorithm of OBE system and automated system for course instructor, coordinator and admin.

title: ANDROMEDA
description: IUT FIS club website containing News Feed, Space APIs integration, E-commerce marketplace, Real time quizzing system, Online Recruitment and Space Simulations.

title: CREDIT SCORING SYSTEM
description: A machine learning approach to predict the 'Credit Score' of the customers for the Micro Finance Institutions (MFIs).

title: FAKE NEWS DETECTION
description: A machine learning approach to detect the fake news. Using Naive Bayes, Passive Aggressive Algorithm and LSTM.

title: TIC TAC TOE
description: A simplistic Tic Tac Toe game with a user-friendly interface. Implemented logic for detecting winning conditions, draws, and handling user input.
